title: Creative Problem-Solving-Based Flipped Learning Course to Strengthen Dance Choreography Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dance techniques and understanding of the creative process
context.additional_context: Large-scale dance creation education conducted in a smartphone-based limited technological environment for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three original dance piece concepts by applying a creative problem-solving model.
Learners can utilize pre-learning materials provided in a flipped learning format to collaboratively create high-quality choreography with peers during actual class time.
Learners can perform creative thinking training and conduct self-assessments at least twice a week through microlearning content delivered in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
